okama.Portfolio¶

class okama.Portfolio(symbols=None, *, first_date=None, last_date=None, ccy='USD', inflation=True, weights=None)¶

Implementation of investment portfolio. Arguments are similar to AssetList (weights are added), but different behavior. Works with monthly end of day historical rate of return data. TODO: rebalance_period should be an attribute

__init__(symbols=None, *, first_date=None, last_date=None, ccy='USD', inflation=True, weights=None)¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

Methods

Initialize self.

describe([years])

Generate descriptive statistics for the portfolio.

forecast_monte_carlo_cagr([distr, years, …])

Calculate percentiles for forecasted CAGR distribution.

forecast_monte_carlo_returns([distr, years, n])

Generates N random monthly returns time series with normal or lognormal distributions.

forecast_monte_carlo_wealth_indexes([distr, …])

Generates N future random wealth indexes.

forecast_wealth([distr, years, percentiles, …])

Calculate percentiles of forecasted random accumulated wealth distribution.

forecast_wealth_history([years, percentiles])

Compute accumulated wealth for each CAGR derived by ‘percentile_from_history’ method.

get_cagr([period])

Calculates Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) for a given period: None: full time ‘YTD’: Year To Date compound rate of return (formally not a CAGR) Integer: several years

get_cumulative_return([period])

Calculate cumulative return of return for the portfolio.

get_cvar_historic([time_frame, level])

Calculate historic Conditional Value at Risk (CVAR, expected shortfall) for the portfolio.

get_rebalanced_portfolio_return_ts([period])

get_rolling_cagr([years])

Rolling portfolio CAGR (annualized rate of return) time series.

get_rolling_cumulative_return([window])

Calculate rolling cumulative return.

get_var_historic([time_frame, level])

Calculate historic Value at Risk (VaR) for the portfolio.

kstest([distr])

Performs Kolmogorov-Smirnov test on portfolio returns and evaluate goodness of fit.

kurtosis_rolling([window])

Calculate rolling Fisher (normalized) kurtosis time series for portfolio returns.

percentile_from_history(years[, percentiles])

Calculate given percentiles for portfolio CAGR (annualized rolling returns) distribution from the historical data.

percentile_inverse([distr, years, score, n])

Compute the percentile rank of a score (CAGR value) in a given time frame.

plot_forecast([distr, years, percentiles, …])

Plots forecasted ranges of wealth indexes (lines) for a given set of percentiles.

plot_forecast_monte_carlo([distr, years, n, …])

Plots N random wealth indexes and historical wealth index.

plot_hist_fit([distr, bins])

Plots historical distribution histogram and theoretical PDF (Probability Distribution Function).

plot_percentiles_fit([distr, figsize])

Generates a probability plot of portfolio returns against percentiles of a specified theoretical distribution (the normal distribution by default).

skewness_rolling([window])

Compute rolling skewness of the return time series.

Attributes

annual_return_ts

dividend_yield

Calculates dividend yield time series in all base currencies of portfolio assets.

Calculate drawdowns time series for the portfolio.

Performs Jarque-Bera test for normality.

Calculate expanding Fisher (normalized) kurtosis time series for portfolio returns.
